Vertical alignment
Responsive Cards for breakpoints over 900 px (desktop), have adjustable vertical
alignment. When the content is vertically centred, the Button is grouped with the body
text container while the default version will keep the button at the bottom of the card.
The default layout will keep the button fixed to the bottom of the container. The vertical centered variant will align the content in the middle of the layout.
Media container
The Card can be used with or without a media container. It supports, Image, Simple
Video player and Shoppable Image.

Themes
The Card supports different themes for communication, approved by IKEA Brand team.
Use the themes to communicate specific messages, such as Wayfinding, Lowest price
and Important messages. Please note that the colours should never be changed or
altered since each card contains a theme file that sets both the text colour and the
background colour.
